data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bonaldo, Alexandre B., Brescovit, Antonio D., Rheims, Cristina A. (2005): On a new species of Ericaella Bonaldo (Araneae, Miturgidae, Eutichurinae), with a cladistic analysis of the genus. Zootaxa 835: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170688
